function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing human validation and verification of pedestrian detections and social distancing indicators, providing training on interpretation of model outputs","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparative evaluation of multiple detection models, considering the unique strengths and weaknesses of each model, and incorporating ensemble techniques if necessary","category":"Monitoring and control of indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use smoothing techniques to manage noise in the precision / recall curve before calculating area under the curve auc","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Be aware of computation method changes and standardize evaluation process according to the latest guidelines","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perform thorough comparative analysis and consider using ensemble methods to combine predictions from multiple models for improved accuracy","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilize multiple thresholds or non-threshold based classification methods","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use additional post-processing techniques to filter false positives","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Utilize ensemble methods or cascaded detection approaches to improve object detection","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforce social distancing guidelines, educate the public on the importance of social distancing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular calibration and testing of object detection system, use of multiple detection algorithms","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use touchless or voice-activated input methods for selecting roi, or regularly sanitize the mouse and surrounding area","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Minimize in-person data collection by using pre-labeled datasets or remote sensing techniques for model training","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize dedicated or private gpu resources for computation, or ensure stringent cleaning and sanitization protocols for shared gpu resources","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict monitoring and enforcement of social distancing regulations","category":"Raising
